message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to offer it to you at a price of $12000. I believe this is a great value considering the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $10500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as high as $10500, but I'm willing to move closer to your target price. I'll offer the product to you for $10800. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target price. I'll try to meet you halfway from your latest offer. I'll counter with $10400. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as high as $10400, but I'm willing to move closer to your target price. I'll offer the product to you for $10600. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target price. I'll try to meet you halfway from your latest offer. I'll counter with $10300. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as high as $10300, but I'm willing to move closer to your target price. I'll offer the product to you for $10500. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm afraid I've reached my limit. I'm willing to walk away if I can't get a better deal. I'll counter with $10000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher.
